summary: An ENB , very realistic and bright that will make your skyrim incredibly beautiful , based on the TRU preset . Needs ELFX and no other lighting mod ( ENBseries v265 ) and mod collection.
descriptionHtml:
[font=Times New Roman][size=6][center][color=#6aa84f]YORN[/color] ENB[/center][/size][/font][center][size=3]By [color=#b6d7a8]Pyerre[/color][/size][/center][center][/center][center][youtube]gFh8h80EE-8[/youtube][/center]                                    [img]http://7.t.imgbox.com/pciRUFgn.jpg[/img]     [img]http://5.t.imgbox.com/mLJ2wkBT.jpg[/img]
[center][size=3][youtube]sHzHNSi9qtM[/youtube]
[youtube]Tga9MCKtY0g[/youtube]
First sorry for my english , it's not my native langage 

THIS IS A WIP (Work In Progress)




This is a new ENB preset, designed to bring vibrant colors,bright and dark areas , and sharpness. It designed around having bright and clear days and amazing nights and deepest blue skies. This ENB looks best for [color=#6aa84f]screenchenary[/color][/size][size=3][color=#6aa84f] [/color]but it's also a [color=#6d9eeb]gaming preset [/color].[/size][/center]
[size=4][font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][b]REQUIREMENTS :[/b][/color][/font][/size][size=4] [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/27043/?]Enhanced Light and FX [/url](only the core file) / This Preset is incompatible with other lighting/weather mod ! 

[/size][color=#6aa84f][size=4][u]How to Install[/u]  :
[/size][/color]
[size=3]1) Copy all the files from the Yorn ENB folder to where your TESV.exe is located 
2) Active the YornWeather.esp at the end of your load order [/size]
[size=3]3) Edit Skyrimpref.ini[/size]
[size=4]  [Display]
  bFloatPointRenderTarget=1
  bTreesReceiveShadows=1
  bDrawLandShadows=1
  bShadowsOnGrass=1
  fGamma = 0.9600
[/size]
[font=Georgia][color=#6aa84f][size=5][center][u][b]Mod Compilation [/b][/u][/center][/size][/color][/font][center][size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/607/?]
HD 2K [/url]
[/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58960/?][size=3]Tamriel Reloaded Rocks[/size][/url][size=3][/size]
[size=3][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/62546/?]Kakasi's Ice Texture[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32246/?]Ultimate Lush Overhaul[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]Unique Grasses an[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]d Groundcovers
[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54196/?]P[/url][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54196/?]lugin 

[/url][/size][color=#6aa84f][size=5][u]CREDITS
